skills.title: Tier 01: Set of the corrupted
skills.name: corrupted
skills.basic_desc: Known to cause moral chaos and sway even the most devoted lawman.
skills.aced_desc:
Mastermind and Fugitive skill point requirements for each tier are reduced by 10%.
Experience gained is increased by 5%.

Note: Bonuses to skill trees do not stack.

skills.title: Tier 01: The slaughterhouse set
skills.name: slaughterhouse
skills.basic_desc: Used in crimes that requires the Enforcer to get his hands dirty.
skills.aced_desc:
Enforcer and Fugitive skill point requirements for each tier are reduced by 10%.
Experience gained is increased by 5%.

Note: Bonuses to skill trees do not stack.

skills.title: Tier 01: Set of the ingenious
skills.name: ingenious
skills.basic_desc: Cold, calculating and a master of foced disappearances, dead or alive.
skills.aced_desc:
Technician and Fugitive skill point requirements for each tier are reduced by 10%.
Experience gained is increased by 5%.

Note: Bonuses to skill trees do not stack.

skills.title: Tier 01: The assassin set
skills.name: assassin
skills.basic_desc: Modern assassin that carries out death sentences - for the right price.
skills.aced_desc:
Ghost and Fugitive skill point requirements for each tier are reduced by 10%.
Experience gained is increased by 5%.

Note: Bonuses to skill trees do not stack.

skills.title: Unlocking the infamy tree
skills.name: glasses
skills.basic_desc: As a new arrival to the criminal elite, the first order of business is for you to get gear and fanfare befitting someone of your status.
skills.aced_desc:
Your infamous base drop rate is increased from 0.7% to 1.4%
Experience gained is increased by 5%.
Cash cost for every skill is reduced by 25%.
There is a 100% chance that you can revive crew members at a distance by shouting at them. This cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.
skills.name: inspire
skills.title: Inspire
skills.basic_desc: You revive crew members 50% faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement speed by 20% for 30 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Adds 3 more first aid kits to your inventory. Your deployed first aid kits will be automatically used if a player would go down within a 5 meter radius of the first aid kit.
skills.name: uppers
skills.title: Uppers
skills.basic_desc: Adds 7 more first aid kits to your inventory.

skills.aced_desc: Your doctor bags have 2 more charges.
skills.name: combat-doctor
skills.title: Combat Doctor
skills.basic_desc: You can now place 2 doctor bags instead of just one.

skills.aced_desc: Crew members that use your first aid kits or doctor bags take 15% less damage for 120 seconds.
skills.name: quick_fix
skills.title: Quick Fix
skills.basic_desc: Decreases your first aid kit and doctor bag deploy time by 50%.

skills.aced_desc: The damage reduction is increased by an additional 50%.
skills.name: painkillers
skills.title: Painkillers
skills.basic_desc: Crew members you revive take 30% less damage for 5 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Reviving a crew member gives them 30% more health.
skills.name: combat-medic
skills.title: Combat Medic
skills.basic_desc: You gain a 30% damage reduction for 5 seconds both after and during reviving another player.

skills.aced_desc: Having at least one hostage or converted law enforcer makes you regenerate 4.5% health every 5 seconds.
skills.name: hostage-taker
skills.title: Hostage Taker
skills.basic_desc: Having at least one hostage or converted law enforcer makes you regenerate 1.5% health every 5 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Your hostages will not flee when they have been rescued by law enforcers. Whenever you get into custody, your hostages will trade themselves for your safe return. This effect can occur during assaults, but only 1 time during a heist.
skills.name: stockholm-syndrome
skills.title: Stockholm Syndrome
skills.basic_desc: Civilians are intimidated by the noise you make and remain intimitdated 50% longer.

skills.aced_desc: Having a converted enemy increases your health by 30%.\nYour converted enemy takes an additional 45% less damage. Does not stack with Joker damage reduction, but multiplies.
skills.name: partner-in-crime
skills.title: Partner in crime
skills.basic_desc: Having a converted enemy increases your movement speed by 10%. \nYour converted enemy takes an additional 45% less damage. Does not stack with Joker damage reduction, but multiplies.

skills.aced_desc: You can now have 2 converted enemies at the same time.
skills.name: dominator
skills.title: Confident
skills.basic_desc: The power and range of your intimidation is increased by 50%.

skills.aced_desc: The converted enemy gains 55% more health and deals 45% more damage. The time to convert an enemy is reduced by 65%.
skills.name: joker
skills.title: Joker
skills.basic_desc: You can convert a non-special enemy to figth on your side. This can not be done during stealth and the enemy must have surrendered in order for you to convert them.\nYou can only convert one non-special enemy at a time.

skills.aced_desc: You and your crew gain 0.5 damage absorption for each hostage you have. This effect stacks with up to a maximum of 8 hostages.\nNote: This skill does not stack with other players Forced Friendship skill.
skills.name: cable-guy
skills.title: Forced Friendshiop
skills.basic_desc: Increases your supply of cable ties by 4. You can cable tie hostages 75% faster.

skills.aced_desc: The amount of headshotes required is reduced to 2.
skills.name: ammo_efficiency
skills.title: Ammo Efficiency
skills.basic_desc: Hitting 3 headshots in less than 6 seconds will refund 1 bullet to your used weapon. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot mode.

skills.aced_desc: Enemies you mark take an additonal 50% damage when further than 10 meters.\nIncreases the duration of marked enemies by 100% and you can now mark specials by aiming at them with any weapon.
skills.name: high_value_target
skills.title: High Value Target
skills.basic_desc: Enemies you mark take 15% more damage.

skills.aced_desc: Any killing headshot will reduce your reload time by 40% for 2 seconds. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
skills.name: aggressive_reload
skills.title: Aggressive Reload
skills.basic_desc: Increases your reload speed with assault rifles by 15%.

skills.aced_desc: Your weapon zoom level is increased by 25% with all weapons. Your weapon accuracy while moving with SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles is increased by 50%.
skills.name: sharpshooter
skills.title: Rifleman
skills.basic_desc: Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with all wepaons.\nYour movement speed is unhindered while using steel sight.

skills.aced_desc: You gain a 20% accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with all SMG, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot mode.
skills.name: marksman
skills.title: Marksman
skills.basic_desc: You gain 8 weapon accuracy with all SMG, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot.

skills.aced_desc: You gain 16 weapon accuracy while standing still.
skills.name: rifleman
skills.title: Stable shot
skills.basic_desc: You gain 8 weapon stability.

skills.aced_desc: The damage bonus now applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw. Your weapon swap speed is increased by 80%\nNote: Does not apply to grenade launchers.
skills.name: overkill
skills.title: OVERKILL
skills.basic_desc: When you kill an enemy with a shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you recieve a 75% damage increase for 30 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: You gain a 50% increased effective range with Shotguns when aiming down sights.
skills.name: far_away
skills.title: Far away
skills.basic_desc: Your accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with Shotguns is increased by 40%.

skills.aced_desc: Your rate of fire is increased by 35% while firing from the hip with single shot Shotguns. Shotguns with magazines have their magazine sizes increased by 15 shells.
skills.name: close_by
skills.title: Close by
skills.basic_desc: You can now hip-fire with your Shotguns while sprinting.

skills.aced_desc: You reload shotguns 35% faster. You gain a 125% increased steel sight speed when using Shotguns.
skills.name: shotgun_cqb
skills.title: Shotgun CQB
skills.basic_desc: You reload shotguns 15% faster.

skills.aced_desc: You deal 15% more damage with shotguns.
skills.name: shotgun_impact
skills.title: Shotgun Impact
skills.basic_desc: Your weapon stability with all shotguns is increased by 8. You deal 10% more damage with shotguns.

skills.aced_desc: When three or more enemies are within 18 meters of you, you also receive 15% damage reduction that lasts for 7 seconds.
skills.name: underdog
skills.title: Underdog
skills.basic_desc: When three or more enemies are within 18 meters of you, you receive a 15% damage bonus that lasts for 7 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Unlocks the ability to wear the Improved Combined Tactical Vest.
skills.name: iron-man
skills.title: Iron Man
skills.basic_desc: Your total armor values is increased by 30%.

skills.aced_desc: Enables your weapons to have a chance to knock back Shield enemies when attacking them. Ranged weapons' knock back chance is increased the higher the total damage of the weapon is. Melee weapons' knock back chance is 100%.
skills.name: shock_and_awe
skills.title: Shock And Awe
skills.basic_desc: Increases the armor recovery rate for you and your crew by 25%.

skills.aced_desc: You regenerate an additional 20 armor for each succesful headshot.
skills.name: bullseye
skills.title: Bullseye
skills.basic_desc: You regenerate 5 armor for each successful headshot. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the armor of all Ballistic vests by 20.
skills.name: die_hard
skills.title: Die Hard
skills.basic_desc: You take 50% less damage while interacting with objects.

skills.aced_desc: For each 10 armor points the bag movement penalty is reduced by 1%.
skills.name: transporter
skills.title: Transporter
skills.basic_desc: You can throw bags 50% further.

skills.aced_desc: Reduces the visual effect duration of Flashbangs by 75%
skills.name: thick_skin
skills.title: Resilience
skills.basic_desc: Increases your armor recovery rate by 15%.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the amount of ammo you gain from ammo boxes by 75%. You also gain a 5% base chance to get a throwable from an ammo box. The base chance is increased by 1% for each ammo box you pick up that does not contain a throwable. When a throwable has been found, the chance is reset to its base value. \nNote: Does not stack with the perk deck skill "Walk-in Closet".
skills.name: fully-loaded
skills.title: Fully Loaded
skills.basic_desc: Your total ammo capacity is increased by 25%.

skills.aced_desc: Each ammo bag contains additional 200% ammunition.
skills.name: ammunition-specialist
skills.title: Extra Lead
skills.basic_desc: You can now place 2 ammo bags isntead of just one.

skills.aced_desc: You can now saw through shield enemies with your OVE9000 portable saw. When killing an enemy with the saw, you have a 50% chance to cause nearby enemies in a 10 m radius to panic. Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
skills.name: carbon-blade
skills.title: Saw Massacre
skills.basic_desc: Reducing the wear down of the blades on enemies by 50%.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the base duration of the effect by up to 15 seconds.
skills.name: bullet-storm
skills.title: Bulletstorm
skills.basic_desc: Ammo bags placed by you grant players the ability to shoot without depleting their ammunition for up to 5 seconds after interacting with it. The more ammo players replenish, the longer the duration of the effect.

skills.aced_desc: You gain 1 extra saw blade for the OVE0 9000 portable saw. You replace your saw blades with carbon blades, increasing your saw efficiency by 40%.
skills.name: portable-saw
skills.title: Portable Saw
skills.basic_desc: Unlocks the OVE9000 portable saw for you to use as a secondary weapon.

skills.aced_desc: Every 6th enemy you kill will drop an extra ammo box.
skills.name: scavenger
skills.title: Scavenger
skills.basic_desc: Your ammo box pick up range is increased by 50%.

skills.aced_desc: You can now carry an additional 2 extra sentry guns.
skills.name: tower_defense
skills.title: Tower Defense
skills.basic_desc: You can now carry 1 extra sentry guns.

skills.aced_desc: You can now toggle AP rounds on your sentry guns, lowering the rate of fire by 75%, but increasing the damage by 250% and allowing it to pierce through enemies and shields.
skills.name: engineering-
skills.title: Engineering
skills.basic_desc: You can now select a less noisy version of the sentry guns, making them much less likely to be targeted by enemies.

skills.aced_desc: You can now equip a second deployable to bring with you. If your deployable is equipped as a secondary deployable, you can only bring half of what you would bring if it was equipped as a primary deployable.\nPress X to toggle between deployables.
skills.name: jack_of_all_trades
skills.title: Jack of all trades
skills.basic_desc: You deploy and interact with all deployables 50% faster.

skills.aced_desc: Your sentry guns rotation speed is increased by 150%. Your sentry guns also have 50% more ammunition.
skills.name: sentry_targeting_package
skills.title: Sentry Targeting Package
skills.basic_desc: Your sentry guns gain a 100% increase in accuracy.

skills.aced_desc: Your sentry guns gain 150% increased health.
skills.name: eco_sentry
skills.title: Eco Sentry
skills.basic_desc: The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced to 48%.

skills.aced_desc: Your sentry guns gain a protective shield.
skills.name: third_law
skills.title: Third Law
skills.basic_desc: The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced to 56%.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the fire effect duration by 10 secondsa nd increases the fire effect radius by 50%.
skills.name: fire_trap
skills.title: Fire trap
skills.basic_desc: Your trip mines now spread fire around the area of detonation for 10 seconds in a 7.5 meter diameter.

skills.aced_desc: You gain 2 more shaped charges and 7 more trip mines.
skills.name: more_firepower
skills.title: More Firepower
skills.basic_desc: You gain 1 more shaped charges and 4 more trip mines.

skills.aced_desc: Enables the ability to reset a broken drill or saw with a melee attack. The ability has a 50% chance to fix the drill or saw. The ability can only be used once per time the drill or saw is broken.
skills.name: kickstarter
skills.title: Kickstarter
skills.basic_desc: Your drills and saws gain an additional 20% chance to automatically restart after breaking.

skills.aced_desc: Your trip mine damage is increased by  50%.
skills.name: combat_engineering
skills.title: Combat Engeneering
skills.basic_desc: The radius of your trip mine explosion is increased by 30%.

skills.aced_desc: Your drill and saw timer is decreased by an additional 15%.
skills.name: drill-sergeant
skills.title: Drill Sawgeant
skills.basic_desc: Your drill and saw timer is decreased by 15%.

skills.aced_desc: Gives your drills and saws a 10% chance to automatically restart after breaking.
skills.name: hardware_expert
skills.title: Hardware Expert
skills.basic_desc: You fix drills and saws 25% faster. Drills and saws are also silent.   Civilians and guards must see the drill or saw in order to become alerted.

skills.aced_desc: 62.5% from the bonus headshot damage is is permanently applied to hitting enemies on the body. This skill is only activated by SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons fired in automatic fire mode.
skills.name: body_expertise
skills.title: Body expertise
skills.basic_desc: 18.75% from the bonus headshot damage is permanently applied to hitting enemies on the body. This skill is only activated by SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons fired in automatic fire mode.

skills.aced_desc: Killing 2 enemies with SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons set onautomatic fire mode will reduce your next reload time by up to 60%. This bonus is reduced by 1% for each bullet above 20 in the total magazine size, down to a minimum of 20% reload time reduction.
skills.name: lock_n_load
skills.title: Lock N' Load
skills.basic_desc: You can now hip-fire with your weapons while sprinting.

skills.aced_desc: Your ranged weapons can now pierce through enemy body armor.\nNote: Does not apply to throwable weapons.
skills.name: surefire
skills.title: Surefire
skills.basic_desc: Your SMGs, LMGs and Assault Rifles gain 15 more bullets in the magazine. This does not affect the "Lock n' Load" Ace skill.

skills.aced_desc: Increases your stagger chance to 20%.
skills.name: heavy_impact
skills.title: Heavy impact
skills.basic_desc: Your shots have a 5% chance to stagger all enemies except Bulldozers and Captain Winters.

skills.aced_desc: Your accuracy penalty is decreased by 20% when shooting while moving.
skills.name: fire_control
skills.title: Fire control
skills.basic_desc: You gain 12 weapon accuracy while firing from the hip.

skills.aced_desc: You gain 16 weapon stability.
skills.name: steady_grip
skills.title: Steady grip
skills.basic_desc: You gain 8 weapon accuracy .

skills.aced_desc: The ECM jammer duration is increased by an additional 25% and the ECM feedback duration lasts 25% longer. Pagers are delayed by the ECM jammer.
skills.name: ecm-specialist
skills.title: ECM Specialist
skills.basic_desc: You can now place 2 ECM jammers instead of just one.

skills.aced_desc: You lockpick 50% faster. You also gain the ability to lockpick safes.
skills.name: nimble
skills.title: Nimble
skills.basic_desc: You gain the ability disable 1 camera from detecting you and your crew. Effect lasts for 25 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Your ECM jammer can now also be used to open certain electronic doors.
skills.name: ecm-overdrive
skills.title: ECM Overdrive
skills.basic_desc: Your ECM jammer and feedback duration is increased by 25%.

skills.aced_desc: You gain the ability to place 2 body bag cases.
skills.name: cleaner
skills.title: Cleaner
skills.basic_desc: You gain 1 additional body bag in your inventory.  Also increases the body bag inventory space to 3 from 2.

skills.aced_desc: You gain access to all insider assets. Cleaning costs after killing a civilian is reduced by 75%.
skills.name: sixth_sense
skills.title: Sixth Sense
skills.basic_desc: You gain the ability to automatically mark enemies within a 10 meter radius around you after standing still for 3.5 seconds while in stealth.

skills.aced_desc: You can pick up items while in casing mode. You also gain 30% more value to items and cash that you pick up.
skills.name: chameleon
skills.title: Chameleon
skills.basic_desc: Increases the time before you start getting detected by 25% while in casing mode. You can also mark enemies while in casing mode.

skills.aced_desc: You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 1 point of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 10%.
skills.name: sneaky_bastard
skills.title: Sneaky Bastard
skills.basic_desc: You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 3 points of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 10%.

skills.aced_desc: The effect persists for 6 seconds after your armor has regenerated.
skills.name: dire_need
skills.title: Dire Need
skills.basic_desc: When your armor breaks, the first shot on every enemy will cause that enemy to stagger. This effect ends when your armor regenerates.

skills.aced_desc: When tased, you are able to free yourself from the taser interacting with it within 2 seconds of getting tased.
skills.name: shockproof
skills.title: Shockproof
skills.basic_desc: When tased, the shock effect has a 30% chance to backfire on the Taser, knocking them back.

skills.aced_desc: You gain the ability to sprint in any direction.\nRun and reload - you can reload your weapons while sprinting.
skills.name: parkour
skills.title: Parkour
skills.basic_desc: You gain 10% additional movement speed and 20% ladder climbing speed.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the concealment of all ballistic vests by 4.
skills.name: inner_pockets
skills.title: Inner Pockets
skills.basic_desc: Increases the concealment of melee weapons by 2.

skills.aced_desc: You have 10% increased chance to dodge while sprinting. You gain 15% chance to dodge while crouching or ziplining.
skills.name: duck_and_cover
skills.title: Duck and Cover
skills.basic_desc: Your stamina starts regenerating 25% earlier and 25% faster. You also sprint 25% faster.

skills.aced_desc: The critical hit chance duration is increased to 18 seconds.
skills.name: unseen_strike
skills.title: Unseen Strike
skills.basic_desc: If you do not lose any armor or health for 4 seconds, you gain 35% critical hit chance for 6 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: You gain a 3% critical hit chance for every 1 point of concealment under 35 up to a maximum of 30%.\nNote: Does not apply to grenade launchers.
skills.name: low_blow
skills.title: Low Blow
skills.basic_desc: You gain a 3% critical hit chance for every 3 points of concealment under 35 up to 30%.

skills.aced_desc: You deal an additional 15% more damage with all silenced weapons.
skills.name: silent-killer
skills.title: Specialized Killing
skills.basic_desc: You deal 15% more damage with all silenced weapons

skills.aced_desc: You gain 1 concealment for reach silenced weapon you equip and reduces the concealment penalty of silencers by 2.
skills.name: optical_illusions
skills.title: Optical Illusions
skills.basic_desc: You are 45% less likely to be targeted by enemies.

skills.aced_desc: You gain 12 weapon accuracy with silenced weapons.
skills.name: the-professional
skills.title: The Professional
skills.basic_desc: You gain 8 weapon stability and 100% snap to zoom speed increase with silenced weapons.

skills.aced_desc: This effect also applies your crew when triggered.
skills.name: second_wind
skills.title: Second Wind
skills.basic_desc: When your armor breaks your movement speed is increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the damage boost duration to 10 seconds.
skills.name: trigger_happy
skills.title: Trigger Happy
skills.basic_desc: For every hit with a pistol you gain 20% damage boost that lasts for 2 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

skills.aced_desc: The base damage of all pistols is increased by an additional 10 damage.
skills.name: one_handed_talent
skills.title: One Handed Talent
skills.basic_desc: The base damage of all pistols is increased by 5.

skills.aced_desc: You reload pistols 50% faster.
skills.name: desperado
skills.title: Desperado
skills.basic_desc: Each successful pistol hit gives you a 10% increased accuracy bonus for 10 seconds and can stack 4 times.

skills.aced_desc: You gain a 50% increased rate of fire with pistols.
skills.name: gun_nut
skills.title: Gun Nut
skills.basic_desc: Your pistol magazine sizes are increased by 5 bullets.

skills.aced_desc: Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by an additional 8 and they also have a 50% increased ammo capacity.
skills.name: akimbo
skills.title: Akimbo
skills.basic_desc: Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by 8.

skills.aced_desc: You gain a 8 weapon accuracy with pistols.
skills.name: equilibrium
skills.title: Equilibrium
skills.basic_desc: Decreases the time it takes to draw and holster pistols by 80%.

skills.aced_desc: Your Messiah charge is replenished whenever you use a doctor bag.
skills.name: pistol-messiah
skills.title: Messiah
skills.basic_desc: While in bleedout, you can revive yourself if you kill an enemy. You only have 1 charge.

skills.aced_desc: Increases the duration fo Sawn Song by 6 seconds. Ammunition won't be depleted while the effect is active.
skills.name: swan_song
skills.title: Swan Song
skills.basic_desc: Instead of getting downed instantly, you gain the ability to keep fighting for 3 seconds with a 60% movement penalty before going down.

skills.aced_desc: The chance to get revived is increased by an additional 30%.
skills.name: feign_death
skills.title: Feign Death
skills.basic_desc: When you get downed, you have a 15% chance to instantly get revived.

skills.aced_desc: You move 30% faster for 10 second after being revived.
skills.name: running_from_death
skills.title: Running from Death
skills.basic_desc: You reload and swap weapons 100% faster for 10 seconds after being revived.

skills.aced_desc: You gain 15% of your maximum health after being revived.
skills.name: up_you_go
skills.title: Up You Go
skills.basic_desc: You take 30% less damage for 10 seconds after being revived.

skills.aced_desc: You gain the ability to get downed 1 more time before going into custody.
skills.name: nine-lives
skills.title: Nine Lives
skills.basic_desc: You gain a 50% increase to bleedout health.

skills.aced_desc: Health damage taken is now reduced by 60% and healing received is reduce by 50%.
skills.name: frenzy
skills.title: Frenzy
skills.basic_desc: You only get 30% of your maximum health and cannot heal above it but you take 30% less health damage and healing received is reduced by 75%.

skills.aced_desc: You gain the ability to coutner attack cloackers and their kicks.
skills.name: counter_strike
skills.title: Counterstrike
skills.basic_desc: When charging your melee weapon you will counterattack enemies that try to strike you, knocking them down. The knockdown does not deal any damange.

skills.aced_desc: The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below 50%, you will do up to 100% more damage with ranged weapons as well.\nNote: Does not apply to grenade launchers\nEntering berserker state negates regeneration effects.
skills.name: berserker
skills.title: Berserker
skills.basic_desc: The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below 50%, you will do up to 250% more melee and saw damage.

skills.aced_desc: Whenever you kill an enemy with a melee attack, you will gain a 50% increase in reload speed for 10 seconds.
skills.name: bloodthirst
skills.title: Bloodthirst
skills.basic_desc: Every kill you get will increase your next melee attack damage by 100%, up to a maximum of 300%. This effect gets reset when striking an enemy with a melee attack.

skills.aced_desc: Your melee attacks against special enemies do 50% more damage.
skills.name: pumping-iron
skills.title: Pumping Iron
skills.basic_desc: Your melee attacks against non-special enemies do 50% more damage.

skills.aced_desc: You are 50% more likely to knock down enemies with a melee strike.
skills.name: martial_arts
skills.title: Martial Arts
skills.basic_desc: You take 50% less damage from all melee attacks. Because of training.

perks.title: Brute Strength
perks.name: brute-strength
perks.desc: You gain 10% more health.

perks.title: Helmet Popping
perks.name: helmet-popping
perks.desc: Increases your headshot damage by 25%.

perks.title: Marathon Man
perks.name: marathon-man
perks.desc: You and your crew's stamina is increased by 50%.

perks.title: Blending In
perks.name: blending-in
perks.desc:
You gain +1 increased concealment.

When wearing armor, your movement speed is 15% less affected.

You gain 45% more experience when you complete days and jobs.

perks.title: Wolf Pack
perks.name: wolf-pack
perks.desc: You and your crew gains 15% more health.

perks.title: Walk-in Closet
perks.name: walk-in-closet
perks.desc:
Unlocks an armor bag equipment for you to use. The armor bag can be used to change your armor during a heist.

Increases your ammo pickup to 135% of the normal rate.

perks.title: Testudo
perks.name: testudo
perks.desc:
You gain 10% more armor and your crew gains an additional 5% more armor.

Note: Crew perks do not stack.

perks.title: Fast and Furious
perks.name: fast-and-furious
perks.desc:
You do 5% more damage.

Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by 20%.

perks.title: Hostage Situation
perks.name: hostage-situation
perks.desc:
You and your crew gains 2% max health and 4% stamina for each hostage up to 10 times.

You and your crew will gain 8% damage reduction for having an hostage. 

Note: Crew perks do not stack.

Deck completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during PAYDAY is increased by 10%.

 Maximum amount of stored health depends on your equipped armor.
